definition[0]: a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building
definition[1]: a curved structure above a door, window etc
definition[2]: a curved structure of bones in the middle of your foot
definition[3]: something with a curved top and straight sides
definition[4]: to form or make something form a curved shape
example[0]: Two rows of trees arched over the driveway.
definition[5]: amused because you think you understand something better than other people
example[2]: ‘I think he’s in for a surprise, ’ Ian said, in a somewhat arch tone.
definition[6]: belonging to the highest class or rank
